skills.name: Cannon
skills.description: Charged Cannon.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: Floating Fireball
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 10s] Launches a large fireball that floats slowly and explodes, dealing 420% ATK of Fire DMG and igniting enemies, dealing 18% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s for 3s.
